name: Driftwood Bling Ring
description:
Beautiful organic shaped piece of driftwood which has been pimped up with some beach bling! Silver plated and faux pearl embellishments are placed into the wood. Adjustable ring. 

Materials: Driftwood, faux pearl, and silver plated findings. 
Dimensions: Driftwood approx 20mm across at largest point.
Run: One off. what you see is what you get!

Comes in gift box - see photo -

I use genuine sea glass or pottery that has been collected from the beautiful beaches of Cornwall in the UK. Many of my pieces are found where an old harbour was once a bustling centre of trade. Old Victorian plates, glasswear, ornaments and bottle stoppers are recycled by nature, and sharp shards are polished by the tide beating against the sand.

name: Willow Palace - sea pottery necklace
description:
NEW NOW ALL IN STERLING SILVER

Unusual piece of willow patterned sea pottery, collected from the Cornish Coast and approx 20mm long at longest point. It features a beautiful Palace from the traditional story  that is depicted on the plates. Two birds signify two lovers who were transformed into a pair of doves by the Gods and then flew away from their death to spend eternity together. The Palace is shown in the scene in the background.
 This willow pattern was a popular print that is now a bit more unusual to find when beachcombing, especially this nice rounded curve shape with a palace image. 
It has been wrapped artistically and securely in sterling silver wire.

Materials: Sea glass, sterling silver wire and findings. 
Dimensions: Sea glass approx 20mm across at largest point.
Necklace is approx 16 inches long. Hangs on sterling silver chain with lobster clasp. 
Run: One off. sea glass you see is sea glass you get!

name: Crackled Glaze Triangle Sea Pottery & Hemp Necklace
description:
Crackled Glaze Triangle

Completely one off piece of jewellery made from a triangular shaped piece of terracotta pottery with a textural and unusual crackled glaze on top. It has been drilled and hangs from three strands of hand knitted organic hemp that have then been plaited together. The hemp is really soft to wear, not itchy like cheaper versions, and will wear in beautifully like leather and become a smooth rope. Slips on over your head. 

Materials: Sea pottery, organic hemp. 
Dimensions: 22 inches long. 
Run: One off. 

Comes in gift box 

I use genuine sea glass or pottery that has been collected from the beautiful beaches of Cornwall in the UK. Many of my pieces are found where an old harbour was once a bustling centre of trade. Old Victorian plates, glasswear, ornaments and bottle stoppers are recycled by nature, and sharp shards are polished by the tide beating against the sand.

name: Neon Celtic - very long!!!! - reclaimed fishing nylon & sea pottery statement necklace.
description:
Neon Celtic

Completely one off art piece of jewellery made mostly from flotsam and jetsam collected from the beach. This necklace features hand knitted organic hemp that has then been plaited to form a chunky necklace. The hemp is beautifully soft, not itchy at all, and wears in like leather, all smooth and soft. I have also used reclaimed fishing nylon which I have sourced, washed and weaved into the design, as well as beautiful vintage sparkly swarovski crystals that glitter and sparkle as you catch them in the light. The center of the necklace features a hemp tassel approx 3 inches long and embellished with neon thread and crystal too. This is a long necklace that would look fab over a summer dress. This is only for girls who want to be noticed! 

Materials: organic hemp, vintage swarovski crystal, reclaimed nylon, neon thread. 
Dimensions: Necklace is approx 28 inches long. See photos for fit. 
Run: One off. 

Comes in gift box 

I use genuine sea glass or pottery that has been collected from the beautiful beaches of Cornwall in the UK. Many of my pieces are found where an old harbour was once a bustling centre of trade. Old Victorian plates, glasswear, ornaments and bottle stoppers are recycled by nature, and sharp shards are polished by the tide beating against the sand.

name: Tribal Sea Queen necklace - reclaimed fishing nylon & sea pottery statement necklace.
description:
Tribal Sea Queen

Completely one off art piece of jewellery made mostly from flotsam and jetsam collected from the beach. This necklace features three beautiful pieces of seawashed pottery in textured biscuit, cornflower blue and fresh white. These have been drilled and mounted on the bib. I have used reclaimed fishing nylon which I have sourced, washed and weaved into the design, as well as beautiful vintage sparkly swarovski crystals that glitter and sparkle as you catch them in the light. This is only for girls who want to be noticed! 

Materials: Sea pottery, organic hemp, vintage swarovski crystal, reclaimed nylon, neon thread, textiles. 
Dimensions: 4 x 3 inches central bib. 
Necklace is approx 16 inches long. Sits like a collar. fastens with sea pottery button clasp (see photos) 
Run: One off. 

Comes in gift box 

I use genuine sea glass or pottery that has been collected from the beautiful beaches of Cornwall in the UK. Many of my pieces are found where an old harbour was once a bustling centre of trade. Old Victorian plates, glasswear, ornaments and bottle stoppers are recycled by nature, and sharp shards are polished by the tide beating against the sand.

name: Emerald star sterling silver and sea glass necklace
description:
NEW NOW ALL IN STERLING SILVER

Beautiful small piece of bright emerald seaglass, collected from the Cornish Coast and approx 20mm long at longest point. Wrapped artistically and securely in sterling silver wire. 

Materials: Sea glass, sterling silver wire and findings. 
Dimensions: Sea glass approx 20mm across at largest point.
Necklace is approx 16 inches long. Hangs on sterling silver chain with lobster clasp. 
Run: One off. sea glass you see is sea glass you get! 

Comes in gift box - see photo - 

I use genuine sea glass or pottery that has been collected from the beautiful beaches of Cornwall in the UK. Many of my pieces are found where an old harbour was once a bustling centre of trade. Old Victorian plates, glasswear, ornaments and bottle stoppers are recycled by nature, and sharp shards are polished by the tide beating against the sand.

name: Beach Bling Sea Shell Studs
description:
Beach Bling sea shell studs!

She sells sea shells from the sea shore! 

These little beauties are made from two Cornish winkle shells that have been responsibly collected from the beaches of Kernow. I hate mass shell shell harvesting, so I always collect small batches at a time so I can carefully check that the home I am taking is empty! 
These shells are really pretty, they have flecks of blue, pink and purple in them, the photos do not do them justice! 

They have been topped with some stunning Swarovski crystals that really sparkle and glitter when you catch them in the light. The shells are approx 10-15mm in size, and are attached to a silver plated stud with back. They can be made in Sterling silver for an additional £4 for sensitive ears! just email me at beachshackproject@yahoo.co.uk! 

Perfect for a bit of beach bling on the beach this summer!

name: When the Boat comes in - Hand pianted pebble art
description:
This is a little pebble I collected from Brighton beach. 

When the boat comes in, you will hear him!!! 

It has been hand drawn with durable paints and spray varnished. Can be put outside or inside. 

Approx 3 inches round

name: Fish Skool -Hand painted pebble art
description:
This is a little pebble I collected from Brighton beach. 

Fish Skool! Just some funky fish having a swim together, as you do in the sea...

It has been hand drawn with durable paints and spray varnished. Can be put outside or inside. 

Approx 2.5 inches round

name: Hi! Painted pebble art
description:
This is a little pebble I collected from Brighton beach. 

Hi! This friendly Narwhale is just saying HELLO! 

It has been hand drawn with durable paints and spray varnished. Can be put outside or inside. 

Approx 4 X 2 inches

name: Ahoy Thar! Hand drawn Pebble Art!
description:

Ahoy Thar! This whale is letting you know he has arrived!!!

Approx 3 inches round

name: Cornish Pasty Cushion!
description:
For all you Pasty Lovers out there!!!

Handmade Cornish Pasty Cushion in two colourways, oatmeal and neon pink / Cornflower and neon yellow. Please pick your colour and specify at checkout.

Each one has been lovingly made with 100% high quality organic cotton.

Great addition for your livingroom!

Can be washed at a low temperature in the washing machine.

Size: 18 inches x 8 inches

Made to order, will be dispatched 3 working days from order.

Please note, other cushions and dog not for sale!!!

Any questions just get in touch.
